author: Kane Wu,Sophie Yu
description: He Shuang, a student at a U.S. university stranded in her home city of Chongqing in southwest China during the pandemic, has added more than 300 domestic brands to her list of favourites on Alibaba's (9988.HK) Taobao online mall.
title: Analysis: Chinese flock to home-grown brands in golden opportunity for investors - Reuters

author: Reuters Staff
description: Wimbledon spectators on Monday paid tribute to Sarah Gilbert, the Oxford University professor who co-designed the Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine, giving her a standing ovation on Centre Court before play began in the annual tennis tournament.
title: Tennis-Vaccine developer Gilbert among guests given standing ovation at Wimbledon - Reuters
content:

author: Tom Simonite
description: A study found that a system used to identify cases of sepsis missed most instances and frequently issued false alarms.
title: An Algorithm That Predicts Deadly Infections Is Often Flawed
content: A complication of infection known as sepsis is the number one killer in US hospitals. So its not surprising that more than 100 health systems use an early warning system offered by Epic Systems, the … [+4102 chars]
